ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by grants from the National Science and Technology Major Project of China (2017ZX10305501, 2018ZX10732401, 2018ZX10711001-003, AWS16J020, and BWS16J008), the Key Project of China State Key Laboratory of Pathogen and Biosecurity of China (SKLPBS1806 and SKLPBS1407), the National Natural Science Foundation of China (31200119), and the National Key Research and Development Program of China (2018YFC1200100). We gratefully acknowledge the authors, originating and submitting laboratories of the sequences from GISAIDâ€™s EpiFlu Database on which this research is based.

sec.title: Author Contributions
sec.p: J.L. designed the study with help from T.J., S.Z., B.L., Y.H., and X.P.K.; T.J. and C.F.Q. supervised the project; J.L. coded the scripts for the (d)nt counting, for the feature extraction, and the machine learning models; J.L. performed the data analysis under assistance from T.J., S.Z., X.Y.W., M.T.H., Y.C.L., and Z.P.Z.; C.F.Q. and B.L. gave constructive comments on the article. J.L. wrote and edited the manuscript, with suggestions from T.J., S.Z., Y.H., X.P.K., and Z.P.Z.
